Page.AboutMe1: I am a dedicated and motivated web developer with over 2 years of programming experience. I enjoy working in a team, actively contributing to common goals and making projects successful.
Page.AboutMe2: My passion for continuous learning and professional growth motivates me to take on new challenges and apply my diverse skills in different areas. My main focus is frontend development, but I also have experience working with the backend.
Page.WeatherApp: This iOS mobile app provides users with up-to-date weather information in real-time. Users can see current conditions, forecasts for several days ahead, humidity, pressure, wind speed, and other meteorological data.
Page.TodoApp: The web application is built for task management, allowing users to track and organize tasks effectively.
Page.SpotifyApp: The web application was created using modern web technologies for streaming music. The project allows users to listen to their favorite tracks, create playlists, and discover new music.
Page.HRMApp: The web application is designed to manage personnel and automate key HR processes, including leave management, time tracking, and HR document management.
Page.title: Internationalisation avec Next.js 14
